mapper.select: SELECT fundCode, fundName, fundShortName, fundType FROM fundnamedata;
SELECT fundCode, valueDate, NAV, cumulativeNAV, dailyGrowthRate, subscribeStatus, redemptionStatus, melonCutting FROM fundvaluedata WHERE fundCode=#{fundCode} ORDER BY valueDate ASC;

SELECT fundCode, valueDate, NAV, cumulativeNAV, dailyGrowthRate, subscribeStatus, redemptionStatus, melonCutting FROM fundvaluedata WHERE fundvaluedata.fundCode = #{fundCode} AND DATE_FORMAT(fundvaluedata.valueDate, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{startDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT(fundvaluedata.valueDate, '%Y-%m-%d')<= DATE_FORMAT(#{endDate}, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY valueDate ASC;

SELECT fundCode, fundName, fundShortName, fundType, fundLastNAVDate, fundLastNAV, fundCumulativeNAV, fundNAVGrowthRate, fundIncomeRateOneWeek, fundIncomeRateOneMonth, fundIncomeRateThreeMonth, fundIncomeRateSixMonth, fundIncomeRateOneYear, fundIncomeRateTwoYear, fundIncomeRateThreeYear, fundIncomeRateCurrentYear, fundIncomeRateCreatedToNow, fundCreatedDate FROM fundbasedata WHERE fundType LIKE CONCAT("%",#{fundType},"%") AND ID >=(SELECT ID FROM fundbasedata WHERE fundType LIKE CONCAT("%",#{fundType},"%") ORDER BY ID LIMIT #{startIndex},1) LIMIT #{dataNum};
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM fundbasedata WHERE fundType LIKE CONCAT("%",#{fundType},"%");
